message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500.  It's a fantastic deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I'm interested in your product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still not quite there yet.  I'm willing to come down to $9,000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. What do you say?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $8,750. Can you consider this revised offer?
